import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useCart } from "../../context/CartContext"; import { CartProducts } from "./CartProducts"; const CartSection = () => { const [totalMarketPrice, setTotalMarketPrice] = useState(0); const [totalQuantity, setTotalQuantity] = useState(0); const [totalDisount, setTotalDisount] = useState(0); const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = useState(0); const { cart, setCart, addToCart, removeFromCart, clearCart } = useCart(); useEffect(() => {}, [cart]); return ( <>

₹ {totalMarketPrice}

{totalQuantity}

); }; export default CartSection;
